programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: In this black comedy, a sanatorium isolated in the mountains becomes a microcosm of Kyrgyzstan; its residents comprise of a tourist, a TV host, a pervert, Chinese businessmen and drugged-up youths. Excised in linear time, reality dissolves into fantasy.

programme.title: Roxanne

programme.title: All For Diego

programme.title: Nick-Off Duty
programme.desc: When Lenny sets off on a mission to avenge her mother’s murder, she finds herself in trouble with the Russian mob and an underground organ harvesting ring. Her father, Hamburg cop Nick and his partner must race against the clock to rescue her.

programme.title: Heart Of A Lion
programme.desc: Teppo, the leader of a gang of neo-nazis, falls in love with Sari. To his shock, Sari’s son is black, and Teppo finds his prejudices and loyalties pitted against his desire for love and family.

programme.title: Timeline
programme.desc: A romantic reunion turns into a life-or-death game of secrets and survival, where the past cannot stay hidden.

programme.title: Vera Dreams of the Sea
programme.desc: Vera, a devoted wife, mother, and grandmother, has her serene life turned upside down by her husband's sudden suicide. As greedy relatives and an underworld scheme threaten their family’s home, she must confront danger and take control of her own fate.

programme.title: Intimate Stranger
programme.desc: In post-COVID Tokyo, single mother Megumi is desperate to find her missing son Shinpei. After a shady young man claims to know her son’s whereabouts, he is invited into Megumi’s home where he soon uncovers a shocking secret.

programme.title: Free Money
programme.desc: Based on true stories of the crypto and investment craze of the early 2020-ies. Crypto's allure, wealth's pursuit, and the lessons of a changing financial world collide in an intense journey of three interconnected lives - an unwitting Bitcoin holder, a crypto entrepreneur and a conservative banker.

programme.title: The Kiss
programme.desc: In 1913 Denmark, young officer Anton grapples with duty and love when he befriends Baron von Løvenskjold's daughter, Edith, confined to a wheelchair. As their bond deepens, Anton is ensnared in a web of promises and lies, torn between pity and true love.

programme.title: Thank You For Coming
programme.desc: After coming to the realization that time is not on his side, a small-time actor who currently works as a restaurant waiter, must try anything and everything to fulfil his dream of starring in a feature film.

programme.title: Cloud Under The Roof
programme.desc: Paul, Julia, and Lilly are a happy family, until Julia dies unexpectedly. For the sake of his daughter, Paul wants to function and suppress his grief. Lilly keeps challenging him with her imagination and her very own view of Mum's death.

programme.title: 15 Years
programme.desc: After being wrongfully imprisoned for 15 years, piano prodigy Jenny meets Syrian refugee Omar and agrees to accompany him on a talent show. There, Jenny faces the man who framed her and her ex, and she must choose between vengeance and happiness.

programme.title: Pure White
programme.desc: Vural, a husband and a father who was raised in faith, leads a seemingly pious and conformist life. Yet, everything takes a sudden dark turn when he learns a truth that will force him to confront his views on religion and morality.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: After The Storm
programme.desc: After a celebration in her rural hometown, Karla Petersen is murdered on her way home. Inspector Helen Dorn takes on the case but clashes with local officer Tom Petersen, Karla's brother, who defies warnings to find his sister's killer.

A traffic accident in which Camilla, a lawyer, is involved results in the death of a young man. This forces her to investigate and face unfamiliar places and situations. While on this journey, she will meet Bruno and rediscover herself.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: The Last Resort
programme.desc: Haunted by a colleague's suicide and grappling with guilt, Helen Dorn confronts the unspoken accusations of her fellow officers. At the same time, she is assigned to solve a medical student's murder, where she soon uncovers their double life.
